JobTitle: Content Program Manager - Customer Support (Remote Eligible)
JobFullDesc:
The Smartsheet Support team is looking for a Content Program Manager to take our internal knowledge solution to the next step. As the owner of this solution, you'll ensure that all members of the Customer Support team adopt a knowledge-sharing culture—and in particular, you'll see to it that they have the content they need to provide greater value to Smartsheet customers with more efficiency. Smartsheet is growing quickly and your efforts in this role will help us develop our team, our tools, and our resources to better use knowledge to extend support capabilities efficiently. 
In this role, you'll use your solid understanding of the customer support business combined with your expertise in industry proven practices such as Knowledge Centered Service (KCS) to ensure that our internal knowledge base is outstanding and our entire team understands how to use and maintain it for maximum benefit.
You will report to the Senior Manager for Self-Service Resources in Customer Support.
You Will:

Develop and improve a KCS-centered knowledge management strategy across the Support organization
Oversee the broader knowledge sharing strategy with other customer-facing teams and help onboard them to the system and methodology
Manage the daily operation of the Smartsheet Support internal knowledge solution
Learn the Smartsheet line of products so that you can create content and manage the work of others to ensure that the Knowledge Base has quality content as Smartsheet releases new features or updates
Report on performance metrics and insights as they pertain to the program to assist leadership to drive continuous improvement
Influence and enact a knowledge-sharing culture that creates improvements in content through curation and customer resolutions
Work with people in all levels of the Support and Customer Excellence organizations to understand requirements, develop roadmaps, and establish detailed project schedules and resourcing plans to ensure on-time delivery of needed resources
Recommend system improvements to increase team efficiency and velocity
Provide knowledge workers with continuous visibility to the impact of their contributions

You Have:

5+ years of experience in content management, project management, or a similar role
3+ years experience leading teams or managing direct reports
An understanding of the customer support business and a passion for delivering quality support
A track record for driving change through thought leadership
A track record of being able to produce results working with diverse teams, including remote or outsourced contingent staff
Ability to tailor communication style or approach for maximum impact
Technical writing and editing skills
A degree in English, Journalism, Library Science, Information Management, or equivalent on-the-job experience preferred
A working knowledge of Smartsheet is preferred but not required (Smartsheet product certification a plus)
Experience with Coveo, Salesforce Knowledge, or similar tools that facilitate KCS best practices
Preferred Certificates and/or Certifications: KCS, Service Cloud Specialist

Perks & Benefits:

100% employer-paid medical, dental, and vision coverage for full-time employees
Equity - Restricted Stock Units (RSUs) Equity with all offers
Lucrative Employee Stock Purchase Program (15% discount)
401k Match to help you save for your future (50% of your contribution up to the first 6% of your eligible pay)
Monthly stipend to support your work and productivity
15 days PTO to start, plus Flexible Sick Leave
Teleworking options from any registered location in the U.S. (role specific)
Up to 24 weeks of Parental Leave
Personal paid Volunteer Day to support our community
Opportunities for professional growth and development including access to Audible for Business and LinkedIn Learning online courses
Company Funded Perks, including a counseling membership, primary care membership, local retail discounts, and your own personal Smartsheet account
